descriptionHtml:
============
DESCRIPTION
============
This mod add [color=red] Saider - Sandmer [/color]
Marryable , Essential , 2H weapon , Heavy  Armor , Fire Magic
[color=blue]Esmerian-Snow Elf [/color]
Marryable , Essential , 1H weapon , Light  Armor , Frost Magic
You can find them in [color=orange]Old Hroldan Inn[/color]
I hope you like it


=============
REQUIRED
=============
Apachii Sky Hair Male 1.0
Apachii Sky Hair 1.4 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26870] 4 Race Pack by me [/url]

=============
INSTALLATION 
=============
Setup all files to your data folder

=============
UNINSTALLATION
=============
Delete bsa and esp files
______________________ 

CREDITS:
Apachii for Apachii Sky Hair used in this mod
author: Den987
